tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dna_sequences (
  id INT,
  sequence VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE Gene (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    gene_length INT NOT NULL,
    species_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Alignment (
    alignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alignment_score FLOAT NOT NULL,
    sequence_alignment TEXT NOT NULL,
    gene_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Gene(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EvolutionaryRelationship (
    relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    relationship_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    species1_id INT NOT NULL,
    species2_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (species1_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (species2_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Species (species_id INT PRIMARY KEY, species_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, dna_sequence TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Genes (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, dna_sequence TEXT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE Alignments (alignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT NOT NULL, species_id INT NOT NULL, alignment_sequence TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id), FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id))
CREATE TABLE PhylogeneticTree (tree_id INT PRIMARY KEY, tree_description TEXT NOT NULL, tree_structure TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Mutations (mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, gene_id INT NOT NULL, mutation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, mutation_description TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id))
